The Platters.name: Big Bopper
The Platters.description: 3 Eggs, bacon, sausage, 1 fresh cut home fries, and toast; with your choice of 2 pancakes or 2 french toast.

The Platters.name: Eggs Benedict
The Platters.description: 2 Poached eggs with peameal bacon on an english muffin topped with Hollandaise sauce and served with home fries.

The Platters.name: Eggs Florentine
The Platters.description: 2 Poached eggs with spinach on an english muffin, topped with Hollandaise sauce and served with fresh cut home fries.

The Platters.name: Breakfast Poutine
The Platters.description: Fresh cut home fries topped with chopped bacon, sausage, mushrooms, 2 eggs any style. Smothered with Hollandaise sauce. Served with toast.

The Platters.name: Little Richard
The Platters.description: 2 Eggs, choice of bacon, sausage, or ham. Served with fresh cut home fries and toast; plus your choice of 1 pancake or 1 french toast.

The Platters.name: Big Breakfast
The Platters.description: 2 Eggs, 2 slices of bacon, 2 sausage, and baked beans. Served with fresh cut home fries and toast.

Omelettes.name: Greek
Omelettes.description: Feta cheese, onion, peppers, tomatoes, and black olives.

Omelettes.name: Mexican Omelette
Omelettes.description: Onions, hot peppers, tomatoes and cheese, topped with salsa.

Cruisin' on the Sweet Side.name: Tutti Fruiti
Cruisin' on the Sweet Side.description: Texas style french toast stuffed with strawberries, strawberry cream cheese, and whipped cream.

Cruisin' on the Sweet Side.name: Bo-Diddley
Cruisin' on the Sweet Side.description: Belgian waffle topped with strawberries and whipped cream.

Cruisin' on the Sweet Side.name: Apple Cinnamon French Toast
Cruisin' on the Sweet Side.description: 3 Slices of cinnamon french toast topped with warm apples and cinnamon buttercream icing.

The Classics.name: 2 Eggs with Peameal, Home Fries, and Toast
2 Eggs with Choice of Bacon, Ham, or Sausage, Served with Home Fries and Toast
2 Eggs with Home Fries and Toast
